title: Distinct colored series for Analytics spending charts

requirements.summary: Ensure Analytics spending graphs use two clearly distinct series colors (Hospital vs Medicine) in light/dark themes, with legend and tooltips matching the series colors.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Analytics page, the Hospital Charges series and Medicine Charges series render in two clearly different colors.
The chart colors remain readable and distinct in both light mode and dark mode.
The legend markers and tooltip indicators match the actual series colors used in the chart.
No user-facing text is added or changed to non-English.

file_operations.description: Update the chart series color configuration so the Hospital and Medicine series bind to distinct theme-aware CSS variables (avoid invalid color functions that cause monochrome rendering). Ensure Bars, legend markers, and tooltip indicators all derive from the same configured series colors via the existing shadcn/ui ChartContainer/ChartLegend/ChartTooltip components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Review and, if needed, adjust the existing --chart-* theme tokens to maximize contrast and readability between Hospital vs Medicine series in both light and dark mode, while keeping the palette consistent with the current design system.
